name: Company Research Evaluation
query: Research Anthropic as a potential investment opportunity. Focus on business model, team, market position, and funding.
expected_behavior: Loads the company research workflow from Research/workflows/company.md
Executes parallel MCP calls (parallel-task, perplexity, exa) to gather company data
Spawns 4 parallel Task agents (company-researcher, market-researcher, financial-researcher, team-researcher)
Each agent returns structured findings with clear sections
Synthesizer agent consolidates all findings with investment lens applied
Output includes Executive Summary, Company Overview, Market Analysis, Team Assessment, Financial Analysis, Investment Lens section
Evaluates against cyber•Fund rubric (path to $1B+, moat, business model, founders, timing, Big Tech threat)
Appends log entry to ~/CybosVault/private/.cybos/logs/YYYY-MM-DD.md with workflow, duration, agents, sources

must_have: Output saved to correct location with proper file naming
quality_indicators: Specific metrics and numbers cited (revenue, funding, users)
Comparison to cyber•Fund thesis (AI infra focus)
failure_indicators: MCP or agent failures not handled

test_variants: Research a company outside core focus areas (to test filtering)
notes: This eval tests the full company research pipeline. Baseline run should be conducted before any workflow changes to measure improvement.
